fish.name: Baracuda
fish.description: A fearsome predator with razor-sharp teeth and lightning-fast speed.

fish.name: Blue-Shark
fish.description: A sleek ocean wanderer known for its distinctive blue coloration.

fish.name: Blue-Tang
fish.description: A vibrant reef fish famous for its brilliant blue color and friendly nature.

fish.name: Blue-Whale
fish.description: The largest animal ever known to exist, a gentle giant of the deep.

fish.name: Bonefish
fish.description: The 'gray ghost' of the flats, prized by sport fishermen for its fighting spirit.

fish.name: Butterfly-fish
fish.description: A delicate reef dweller with stunning patterns resembling butterfly wings.

fish.name: Clown-Fish
fish.description: A small but brave fish that lives among sea anemones in perfect harmony.

fish.name: Crab
fish.description: A sideways-walking crustacean with powerful claws and a hard shell.

fish.name: Great-White-Shark
fish.description: The apex predator of the ocean, both feared and respected worldwide.

fish.name: Hammerhead-Shark
fish.description: A unique shark with a hammer-shaped head that enhances its sensory abilities.

fish.name: Lobster
fish.description: A prized delicacy with powerful claws and a talent for walking backwards.

fish.name: Mahi-Mahi
fish.description: A dazzling fish with golden hues that puts up an acrobatic fight.

fish.name: Marlin
fish.description: A majestic billfish and the ultimate trophy for big game anglers.

fish.name: Narwhal
fish.description: The unicorn of the sea, with a distinctive spiral tusk protruding from its head.

fish.name: Pearch
fish.description: A popular freshwater fish with distinctive dark vertical stripes.

fish.name: Sailfish
fish.description: The fastest fish in the ocean, capable of speeds up to 110 km/h.

fish.name: Sea-Bass
fish.description: A versatile predator found in both shallow and deep waters.

fish.name: Sea-Cucumber
fish.description: A peculiar ocean floor dweller that can regenerate lost body parts.

fish.name: Seahorse
fish.description: A tiny marine marvel where males carry and birth the young.

fish.name: Shrimp
fish.description: Small but mighty crustaceans that are essential to ocean food chains.

fish.name: Smallmouth-Bass
fish.description: A feisty freshwater fighter known for its aerial acrobatics when hooked.

fish.name: Starfish
fish.description: A five-armed wonder that can regrow lost limbs and turn its stomach inside out.

fish.name: Tarpon
fish.description: The 'Silver King' - a prehistoric giant known for spectacular jumps.

fish.name: Tuna
fish.description: A powerful swimmer built for speed and endurance across vast ocean distances.

fish.name: Wahoo
fish.description: One of the fastest fish in the sea with razor-sharp teeth and torpedo shape.

fish.name: Sea-Urchin
fish.description: A spiny sphere that grazes on algae and plays a vital role in reef health.

fish.name: Parrot-Fish
fish.description: Colorful reef fish that create sand by eating coral and excreting it.
